channel.title: ~DoomedScape V1.1 Staff Needed~
channel.description:
Hi, I'm working on a new server called "DoomedScape". I am in need of some help from other players though. I have been working on coding it, but I cannot do the port-forward for I do not have a router, So that will be part of someones job. Jobs Availible: Coder-Will be server admin when the server is realesed Graphix-Will be at high chance to be moderator when the server is realesed Web Client Coder-Will be server admin when the server is realesed.
The coder's job is obviously coding the server.
The Grpahix Team-Will Be Designing A Background Image For The WebClient And A Site Banner The Web Client Maker's-Will Be Making A Web Server Like MoparScape Custimized So It Fits DoomedScape.
If you'd like to apply please just post here.

item.title: ~DoomedScape V1.1 Staff Needed~
item.dc:creator: @mod_zack_cez mod zack_cez
item.description:
@mod_zack_cez wrote:

Hi, I’m working on a new server called “DoomedScape”. I am in need of some help from other players though. I have been working on coding it, but I cannot do the port-forward for I do not have a router, So that will be part of someones job.
Jobs Availible:
Coder-Will be server admin when the server is realesed
Graphix-Will be at high chance to be moderator when the server is realesed
Web Client Coder-Will be server admin when the server is realesed.

The coder’s job is obviously coding the server.

The Grpahix Team-Will Be Designing A Background Image For The WebClient And A Site Banner
The Web Client Maker’s-Will Be Making A Web Server Like MoparScape Custimized So It Fits DoomedScape.

If you’d like to apply please just post here.
